text: Octavio Lepage Barreto, (November 24, 1923 - January 6, 2017) Venezuelan Ministry of Justice. (1977). “Revista del Ministerio de Justicia” (Ministry of Justice Magazine) was Acting President of Venezuela from May 21, 1993 through June 5, 1993.Los Angeles Times, 12 October 1987, The World Lepage was born on November 24, 1923 in Santa Rosa, Anzoátegui, Venezuela. He studied at Central University of Venezuela. Lepage married Verónica Peñalver. In 1993, he moved to Caracas, Venezuela. Lepage died in Caracas, Venezuela on January 6, 2017, aged 93. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Presidents of Venezuela Category:Anzoátegui
title: Octavio Lepage
